page.title: 15RECREATION:BAD'HAM/DENN'TON
page.content: By far the most popular leisure pursuits in Badingham & Dennington are sport & gardening followed by reading, music, television & radio, walking, sewing & knitting. The others reflect creativity & self-expression (painting, dancing, drama, photography, bell-ringing, writing, flower-arranging);physical & mental exertion (cycling, bridge, letter writing);social concern (voluntary & youth work, Community Council); membership of organisations (Women's Institute, Scouts & Guides,Over-60's); interest in technology old & new (computers, renovating motor vehicles, Do-It-Yourself) & in history, the arts & the environment (visiting old houses, theatre, travel, camping, breeding rabbits). Solitary & sociable pursuits are well-balanced and most demand active involvement.
